topic.title: Now Available: All Foreign Relations Printed Volumes
topic.body: With this release of fourteen volumes from the 1860s, the largest phase of the Office’s ongoing project to digitize the entire Foreign Relations series comes to a close: all 511 printed volumes released since 1861—an archive of over 300,000 documents—are now keyword- and date-searchable online and downloadable as free ebooks. Read more about this release, the partnership with the University of Wisconsin Digital Collections Center, and the volumes that remain.
topic.image-description: Word cloud generated from 14 Foreign Relations volumes
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
